parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive consumption of oil can cause the engine to seize or fail, leading to a loss of power while driving, which can increase the risk of an accident. Additionally, the engine may catch fire if it runs out of oil.
symptoms: The vehicle burns through oil at an excessive rate
requiring frequent oil changes
the oil light comes on
the engine idles rough
the vehicle may stall or lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the piston rings can cause excessive oil consumption, leading to engine failure, and potentially resulting in a loss of power while driving, increasing the risk of an accident.
symptoms: The vehicle burns through oil at an excessive rate
requiring frequent oil changes
the oil light comes on
the engine idles rough
the vehicle may stall or lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause a loss of power while driving, increasing the risk of an accident. Additionally, the engine may catch fire if it runs out of oil.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a sudden loss of engine power
the engine seizes or fails
the vehicle may stall or lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor mounts can cause the vehicle to vibrate excessively, leading to a loss of control, and potentially resulting in an accident.
symptoms: The vehicle vibrates excessively
the motor mounts are loose or broken
the vehicle may stall or lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, as the vehicle's occupants may not be adequately protected from the impact.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in a crash
despite meeting the necessary deployment criteria
resulting in injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seatbelt to properly restrain the occupant can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, as the occupant may be ejected from the vehicle or suffer from unrestrained movement during a crash.
symptoms: Seatbelts unlatch or fail to properly restrain the occupant during a crash
resulting in injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
often without input from the driver
resulting in loss of control and accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Brakes fail to engage properly
resulting in loss of control and accidents
especially on steep hills.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Sudden acceleration without warning
vehicle takes off at a high rate of speed
failure of brakes to stop the vehicle
vehicle spinning out of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake system failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Brakes locking up
inability to stop the vehicle
brakes remaining locked even after taking foot off the brake pedal
difficulty stopping on wet roads.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Clutch failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Difficulty shifting gears
feeling of driving on glass
uncertainty about which gear to be in
feeling of too much power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof can cause glass shards to fall into the vehicle, potentially injuring occupants, and may lead to accidents due to driver distraction or loss of visibility.
symptoms: The sunroof suddenly shatters or explodes while driving
often without any apparent cause or warning
and may be accompanied by the sound of breaking glass.
